text: Pibanga ochropyga is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Belon in 1896. It is known from Ecuador, Bolivia and Brazil.BioLib.cz - Pibanga ochropyga. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1896
title: Pibanga ochropyga
